item.description:
I mentioned this all to you yesterday. This is the Lost Marbles show tonight out in Watertown. Ben, Lisa, Sandy, Robin, and myself are all in the troupe so you'll get to see us in primetime in the lights. Yell at some sweet suggestions if you come!

Here's all the info, def print out the coupon at the end.



Yo what up dudes and dudettes!!! Come kick back and hang ten with the Marbles and the Joneses this Friday night out on the sweet waves of Watertown! Us marbles will be surfing the start of the show with our hella cool blend of short form improv games. The raddest part is that they'll all be based off you, the audience's, suggestions. Yes way, i swear on the tide.

So yea, def be there and be cool. Latrz hepcats!

And remember...

Everything's chilly sweet now.

Oh and here's a cut out thingy that will save you all some dollars. It's $10 at the door but with this narly coupon it's only $5. Check it http://www.improvjone...

and just

Grab directions at the link below this line
-
http://www.improvjone...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Marbles keeping up with the laughs and the Joneses on stage!
item.name: Lost Marbles with Improv Jones Boston!!!
